name: MemoCards :)
description:
Memory the same card and picture in the bunch!

It's getting harder and harder to find it due to timer is ticking and getting faster.

Challenging Level and Score to game center player. Finding more cards to reach higher level and get higher score.

11 Available schemes to challenge, each scheme has 4x4 and 5x5 mode.

Support Facebook, Twitter and Sinaweibo to share your score and level.

Support iPhone and iPad with retina display.
